basics.name: Gage Minamoto
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a BBA in Management Informational Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2023.

work.summary: Updating and maintaining the ACM System website, including design, content, and backend programming.
highlights: Collaborate across all ACM programs on various campuses to gather and compile content
Track and manage website pages while maintaining quality, editorial standards, and consistency

work.summary: Print design, banner and poster crafting, client communication, and customer service for UHM’s Campus Center Graphics.
highlights: Completed over 20 client projects using extensive print and copy layout knowledge required to work with various print mediums.
Independently and collaborated with design team on designs.

volunteer.summary: Assisted and managed a live tournament under Activision Blizzard for the Overwatch League 2022 Midseason Madness.
highlights: Live event spanning over one week with a $1,000,000 Prize Pool.
Learned from OWL Staff about Esport Operations, Systems Engineering, Event Management, and Content Creation.

volunteer.summary: Directing the program’s Design Style Guidelines to streamline content creation and brand representation.
highlights: Conceptualizing and designing content media projects for the University of Hawai’i Esports Program
Manage and collaborate with a content production team to craft social media content for an audience of gamers over a thousand.

volunteer.summary: Developed Instagram posts adhering to brand design guidelines.
highlights: Collaborated with CEO on 5 collaboration graphic templates for brand’s social media.
